thread.title: E-Complish Offers MobilePay Service Option to Longtime Business Partners
thread.title_full: E-Complish Offers MobilePay Service Option to Longtime Business Partners - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: E-Complish Offers MobilePay Service Option to Longtime Business Partners
text:
Mobile Payment Processing Tool Brings Customer Convenience, Faster Transactions to E-Complish Partners
Baltimore, MD
E-Complish, a leading payment solutions provider, announced it will offer its partners of three or more years MobilePay, the company’s web-based payment solutions service, free of charge. About 80 percent of current E-Complish partners are eligible to receive this free payment solution tool, which will allow customers to pay anywhere on a mobile device or tablet.
“E-Complish is grateful to have so many loyal business partners that rely on our services, and we wanted a way to show our appreciation,” says Stephen Price, CEO of E-Complish. “After seeing the significant increase in customer usage of mobile devices on our client’s HostPay sites, we knew MobilePay would be an extremely beneficial tool for their businesses and customers.”
E-Complish’s MobilePay system detects when a customer is operating from a mobile device and presents a user-friendly version of the merchant’s existing HostPay site.
According to E-Complish, the growth of mobile payments over the past few years has increased exponentially, totaling $171.5 billion worldwide and is expected to reach $1 trillion by 2017. Within the E-Complish network, the growth of mobile versus desktop is now 70/30 in favor of Mobile. Implementation of the MobilePay upgrade to eligible E-Complish business partners is expected to be completed by end of fourth quarter.
E-Complish’s MobilePay adheres to Level 1 PCI Compliance, guaranteeing all transactions are encrypted and secure. MobilePay is a natural addition to E-Complish’s suite of secure payment solutions.
To learn more about E-Complish MobilePay, visit https://www.e-complish.com/solutions/mobile-pay/ .
###
E-Complish, Inc.: Since 1998, E-Complish has helped businesses increase profit and communicate more efficiently with customers through its unique financial services, quickly becoming one of the nation’s most reliable and secure payment partners. For more information about E-Complish, please call 888-847-7744 or visit http://www.e-complish.com .
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/09/prweb12980137.htm
